ีีกีถึีกีบีฅีฟีกีฏีกีถ ีฏีธึีฝีกีฏึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ึีธีญีถีกีญีกีฃีกีฐ ิฑึีดีฅีถ ิฑีทีธีฟีตีกีถีซ ีฃีธึีฎีจ ึีกีฝีฟีกีขีกีถ ีีกึีกีฆีคีกีฟ ีีกึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีตีกีถีจ ยซีปีธึึยป ีง ีธึีกีฏีธึีดึ ีีก ีฏีกึีฎีธึีด ีง, ีธึ ึีกีฒีกึีกีฏีกีถ ีฃีธึีฎีนีซ ีถีฏีกีฟีดีกีดีข ีฏีกีฌีกีถึีซ ีจีถีฉีกึีกีฏีกึีฃีฅึีจ ีฏีซึีกีผีพีธึีด ีฅีถ ีญีฟึีกีฏีกีถ ีธึ ีกีถีกึีคีกึ ีฏีฅึีบีธีพโค ยซิฑีตีฝ ีขีกีถีกีฑึีธีพ ิฑีทีธีฟีตีกีถีจ ีคีกีฝีกีฏีกีถ ึีกีฒีกึีกีฏีกีถ ีขีกีถีฟีกึีฏีตีกีฌ ีงยปึ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีจ ึีกีฝีฟีกีขีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึึีฅีฌ ีง ีถีกึ ีฏีกีฌีกีถีกีพีธึีดีกีถ ีบึีกีฏีฟีซีฏีกีตีซ ีธึ ีกีตีฌีจีถีฟึีกีถึีกีตีซีถ ีญีกึีกีถีดีกีถ ีดีซีปีธึีถีฅึีซ ีดีกีฝีซีถึ

media:group.media:title: CivilNet Wins Court Case Against Government on Mining Inspections
media:group.media:description:
๐Armenia has responded to Azerbaijan's latest proposals related to a peace agreement, while US State Department Advisor Louis Bono pays a visit to Armenia to discuss the process. ๐Pope Francis urges the signing of a peace treaty between Armenia and Azerbaijan and for the refugeesโ right to return in his annual โState of the Worldโ address. ๐CivilNet wins a court case which obligates the government's department of Environmental Protection and Subsoil Inspection to release details on its mining inspections and the violations found. ๐Our latest episode of Mindful Leaders is with scientist, data researcher, and angel investor Dr. Armen Kherlopian. He talks AI, startups, and the inspiration he draws from his family roots from Cilicia. Link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j6kQD8148TQ ๐Also, celebrating Sergei Parajanovโs 100th birthday.

entry.title: We need to protect small companies that can change the face of nations

media:group.media:title: We need to protect small companies that can change the face of nations
media:group.media:description:
In this episode, we explore the life of Armen Kherlopian, Ph.D., a scientist, researcher, angel investor, and advisor to the board of several prominent corporations. We discuss the relevance of artificial intelligence, data sciences, and innovations for tomorrow. With a background in biomedical engineering and biophysics, we assess how Dr. Kherlopian entered the world of entrepreneurship, investments, and startups and how he makes sense of a world increasingly dependent on machine learning. Finally, we explore Dr. Kherlopianโs historical and family legacies from Aintab and Marash, which have been pivotal in his successes and mission to push boundaries in tech and sciences and contribute to the betterment of our world.
About Armen R. Kherlopian
Armen Kherlopian is CEO and Partner at Covenant Venture Capital. He is also a Founding Partner of the BAJ Accelerator, hosted at the Jacobs Technion-Cornell Institute. He serves on the Scientific Advisory Board of the Translational Research Institute for Space Health (TRISH), as well as on the board directors at Scylla. He is also an advisor to Cognaize and Embodied. Previously, Kherlopian served as Chief Science Officer at Genpact, and during his work at Booz Allen Hamilton, he co-wrote the coveted Field Guide to Data Science. Kherlopian is an awardee of the U.S. National Science Foundation Graduate Research Fellowship, U.S. Department of Energy Computational Science Graduate Fellowship, is a Coca-Cola Scholar and a U.S. Delegate to the Lindau Nobel Laureates Meetings. He holds a BS and MS in Biomedical Engineering with a focus on Algorithms from Columbia University and a PhD in Biophysics with a focus on Machine Learning from Cornell University. He also completed a fellowship in High Performance Computing and Artificial Intelligence at Princeton University.
Program Overview Mindful Leaders dives into the stories of people who have achieved prominence, walked incredible journeys, and have defined culture.
Lara sits down with specialists, thinkers, and change catalysts to deconstruct insights, events, and lessons that have shaped their personal and professional lives and have enabled them to create meaning and connection.
00:00 - Intro 1:54 - Who is Armen Kherlopian? 3:09 - Merging science with entrepreneurship and investments 5:01 - Machine learning and AI projects that made great impacts 8:50 - Benefits of AI and machine learning 12:54 -The importance of dreams and efforts today 15:19 - How to address apathy and individualism 17:34 - Childhood and the role of parents 21:11 - Grandparents and lessons from historical legacy 24:29 - Analogy and lessons of innovation between historical Armenians and Armenians today 29:41 - BAJ Accelerator 31:52 - What is required to invest in innovative projects 32:51 - What type of leadership is required to help heal nations? 34:18 - Conclusion

media:group.media:description:
ิตึึีกีถีซ ีกีพีกีฃีกีถีธึ ีธึีธีทีดีกีดีขี 2024-ีซ ีฐีธึีถีพีกึีซ 1-ีซึ ีทีฅีทีฟีกีฏีซ ีฉีกีถีฏีกึีกีถ ีกีพีฟีธีฏีกีตีกีถีกีฟีฅีฒีซีถีฅึีซ ีฐีกีดีกึ ีพีณีกึีถีฅึีจึ ิฑ ีฃีธีฟีธึีด, ีกีตีฝีซีถึีถี ิตึึีกีถีซ ีขีธึีถ ีฏีฅีถีฟึีธีถีธึีด ีฏีกีตีกีถีฅีฌีจ ีฟีกึีฅีฏีกีถ 12 000 ีคึีกีดีซึ ีคีกึีฑีกีพ 160 000 ีคึีกีด, ีซีฝีฏ ิฒ ีฃีธีฟีธึีดี 12 000 ีคึีกีดีซึี 24 000ึ ิฟีกึีดีซึ ีฃีฎีฅึีธึีด, ึีกีฝีฟีกึีซ, ึีธีญีพีฅีฌ ีฅีถ ีดีซีกีตีถ ึีธึึีกีถีกีฏีถีฅึีจ, ีฝีกีฏีกีตีถ ีทีกึีธึีถีกีฏีพีธึีด ีฅีถ ีกึีคีซีกีฏีกีถ ีดีถีกีฌ ีพีณีกึีธีพีซ ีกีพีฟีธีฏีกีตีกีถีกีฟีฅีฒีซีถีฅึีธึีด ีฅีฒีกีฎ ีกีบึ ึีซีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีจี ีกีผีกีถึ ีบีฅีฟีฐีกีดีกึีกีถีซีทีฅึีซ ีดีฅึีฅีถีกีถีฅึ, ีกึีฐีฅีฝีฟีกีฏีกีถ ีกึีฃีฅีฌีกีบีกีฟีถีฅีทีถีฅึ, ีกึีฏีฒีฅึ ึ ีกีบึ ึีซีถีซ ีฐีฝีฏีซีนีถีฅึึ ีีกีฒีกึีกีตีซีถ ีซีทีญีกีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีญีธีฝีฟีกีถีธึีด ีง ีกีผีกีปีซีฏีกีตีธึีด ีกีถีคึีกีคีกีผีถีกีฌ ีกีตีฝ ีญีถีคึีซีถึ

media:group.media:title: Rewriting The Armenian Story
media:group.media:description:
In this Civilnet podcast, host Patrick Elliott sits down with guest Raffi Niziblian, repat and founder of DEEM Communications to discuss what it means to be Armenian, and what the vision for the future of Armenianness means both within Armenia and abroad.
